name: Textured Crew Cut
description: A versatile, low-maintenance short crop with jagged texture on top and tapered sides.
maintenanceTips: Use a matte clay or texturizing paste to define the jagged texture on top.
Schedule a trim every 3-4 weeks to keep the tapered sides looking clean.
Point-cutting the top is essential to maintain the 'messy' but intentional look.

name: Bowl Cut
description: A precision-cut style featuring a straight fringe and uniform length around the perimeter, creating a distinct rounded, bowl-like silhouette.
maintenanceTips: Apply a smoothing serum or light oil to maintain a sleek, frizz-free texture.
Schedule trims every 3-4 weeks to keep the horizontal line sharp and prevent the fringe from covering the eyes.
Blow-dry with a large round brush or use a flat iron to ensure the hair lies perfectly flat and uniform.
